groups.label: General Settings
groups.description: Settings that apply to all Office document types

bPreferenceTranslateWordHeadersFooters.description: Extract text from headers and footers in Word documents.

bPreferenceTranslateWordHiddenText.description: Extract hidden text in Word documents.

bPreferenceTranslateWordComments.description: Extract comment text in Word documents.

bPreferenceTranslateWordTrackingChanges.description: Extract text from tracked changes in Word documents.

bPreferenceAggressiveCleanupWord.description: Aggressively clean up Word formatting codes for cleaner segments.

bPreferenceTranslateExcelSheetNames.description: Extract sheet names in Excel workbooks.

bPreferenceTranslateExcelDrawings.description: Extract text from shapes and drawings in Excel.

bPreferenceTranslateExcelHidden.description: Extract text from hidden cells in Excel.

sExcelExcludedColumns.description: Comma-separated list of columns to exclude from extraction.

bPreferenceTranslatePowerpointNotes.description: Extract speaker notes in PowerPoint presentations.

bPreferenceTranslatePowerpointMasters.description: Extract text from slide masters in PowerPoint.

sPowerpointExcludedSlides.description: Comma-separated list of slide numbers to exclude.

useCodeFinder.description: Enable inline code detection using regex patterns.
